headline: Union Pacific (NYSE:UNP) Faces Shareholder Activism Over Executive Pay Policy
summary: Union Pacific (NYSE:UNP) recently engaged with shareholders by filing a definitive proxy statement opposing a proposal to amend its compensation recoupment policy. This development coincides with a 2.63% rise in the company's share price over the last quarter. The quarter also saw Union Pacific declare a cash dividend of $1.34 per share and initiate a significant share repurchase program, reflecting confidence in its financial health. In parallel, market dynamics showed mixed trends with...
